claim:
Randomisation
Participants will be randomly assigned (1:1) via EPIDAT version 4.2 software (Figure 1) to one of two groups: Group 1, RIPC; Group 2, the control group (CG).
title: Figure 1.
caption: Remote ischaemic preconditioning (RIPC) and control group (CG) protocols.

claim: Figure 2 presents the flowchart detailing patient inclusion and follow-up steps, including screening, eligibility criteria, randomisation, baseline assessments, and evaluations after the intervention.
title: Figure 2.
caption: Flowchart for patient inclusion and follow-up: screening, inclusion and exclusion, randomisation, baseline testing, and postintervention testing.
